Model.Model_name: 2002 Total Phosphorus SPARROW Model for the Missouri River Basin

Constituent.Name: Phosphorus
Constituent.Description: 1992 regional E2RF1 total phosphorus model, includes U.S. portion of Oldman River Basin and the Missouri River Basin

CommonTerms.Term:
Each model has different sources that the modeler has determined to be statistically significant. Choose a source from the list to present data only from that source. This model contains these sources:
All Not really a separate source, it just tallies all the sources together. Reported in kg. Manure P Sum total of Phosphorus from Manure in Confined and Unconfined Operations (kg) Farm Fertilizer P Sum total of Phosphorous Fertilizer from Farms (kg) Developed Land 2001 National Land Cover Dataset developed land area, includes developed open space, low, medium, and high intensity (sqkm) Channel Length Reach length of channels in streams with discharge greater than 1.13 cms (m) Point Sources Sum total of phosphorus from point sources (average of 1992, 1997, and 2002 data) (kg)
